326430.name: Sniper Elite 3 - U.S. Camouflage Rifles Pack
326430.description:
The U.S. Camouflage Rifles pack gives Sniper Elite 3 players access to deadly new variants of three fan-favourite American rifles. Tuned to lethal perfection and encased in a new camouflage livery, these weapons can be used across all multiplayer, singleplayer and co-operative game modes.

This DLC pack includes:

  • M1D Garand (tuned and camouflaged): a purist’s rifle, perfect for customisation and made even more deadly with reduced recoil.
  • Springfield M1903 (tuned and camouflaged): now with reduced recoil and enhanced scope.
  • M1917 Enfield (tuned and camouflaged): now with improved stability and stopping power.
326430.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语*, 意大利语*, 德语*, 西班牙语 - 西班牙*, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语*, 捷克语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
